columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EPSD_START_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Start instant for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_END_INST_DTTM
columns.description: End instant for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_IDENT
columns.description: Unique identifier for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_SET_ID
columns.description: Episode set ID that represents a common identifier across all document revisions.

columns.name: EPSD_TYP_ID_C_NAME
columns.description: The episode type category ID for the received episode.
entries: Medication for Opioid Use Disorder Treatment

columns.name: EPSD_NAME
columns.description: Name of the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_STAT_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description: Status of the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_CMT
columns.description: The free text comment for this row's received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_DOC_ID
columns.description: Universally unique identifier (UUID) of the received episode DXR document.

columns.name: EPSD_DOC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: Document type for the document that has the received episode.
entries: Outgoing Death Registry Reporting IHE VRDR Profile

columns.name: EPSD_ENROLL_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Enrollment instant for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_USES_ENROLL_DT_YN
columns.description: Stores whether an episode considers the enrollment date to be the first effective date of the episode instead of the start date.

columns.name: EPSD_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the episode type for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_CMGMT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Status of the received care coordination episode.

columns.name: EPSD_CMGMT_STATUS_NAME
columns.description: Free text display name for the status of the received care coordination episode.

columns.name: EPSD_DEPT_NAME
columns.description: Free text episode department name.

columns.name: EPSD_SPECIALTY_DEP_NAME
columns.description: Free text department specialty name for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_SPECIALTY_DEP_C_NAME
columns.description: Department specialty ID for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_POOL
columns.description: Free text name of the In Basket pool associated with the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_PARENT_EPISODE
columns.description: The episode identifier for the parent episode.

columns.name: ESPD_SRC_DOCUMENT_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the source DXR CSN that contains the external episode information.

columns.name: EPSD_RCVD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last received instant.

columns.name: EPSD_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of the episode in UTC.
